text: Varför är solen så röd was released in late 1996 and is a studio album by Christer Sjögren.Information at Svensk mediedatabas The album was recorded in Miami, and produced by Ramón Arcusa, also producer for Julio Iglesias. The album sold over 110 000 copies, and Christer Sjögren carried out a concert tour across Sweden and Norway, with songs from the album. The song "Cecilia" charted at Svensktoppen for one week (14 December 1996).Svensktoppen - 14 December 1996 "Jag älskar dig än" received a Svensktoppen test on 22 February 1997.Svensktoppen - 22 February 1997 but failed to enter chart.Svensktoppen - 24 February 1997 ==Track listing== #Varför är solen så röd (Quando calienta el sol) #Vi ska lära för livet (Quiereme mucho) #Quando, Quando, Quando #Jag älskar dig än #Ännu en dag (Johnny Guitar) #Crying in the Moonlight (Månsken i augusti) #Jag vill dansa med dig #San Martinho #Kärlekens vind (Lambada) #Vaya Con Dios #Cecilia #Jamaica (Jamaica: Jamaica Farewell) ==Contributors== *Dan Werner - guitar *Nicky Orta - bass *Tim Divine, keyboard *Lee Levin - drums *Tony Concepcion, trumpet ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !
